And while she thought a little kindness would be enough to keep Yohan from villainy, she didn't think it would lead to a new human life as Yurika, a caring family, love... or the kind of secrets that could change everything the world has ever known.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Hello, Mr. Veterinarian!
description: The night before Lee Jun is set to open his own animal hospital, his childhood pet Pebble visits him in a dream, giving him a mysterious gift. Jun successfully treats his first patient, but when the dog thanks him for saving his life, Jun realizes he can speak to animals! Word about the vet who can understand them spreads quickly among the four-legged residents of the neighborhood, and they come flocking to Jun's hospital. With his new ability, will Jun be able to save all these furry friends?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Aristité was Blessed with a Curse
description: In the Kingdom of Strandeon, one man from each noble family is required to serve in the Order of the Royal Vine, and Aristité is chosen to fulfill this duty for House Theseus. One day, while the order is carrying out a mission, a witch places a curse on Aristité, saying that he'll lose something important. Everyone in the order thinks that this curse is what transforms Aristité into a woman, but little do they know that Aristité, whose real name is Ariel, was a woman from the start. All the curse did was take away her special medicine that changes her voice. With the help of her friends and cousin, Ariel struggles to protect her secret, but someone in the order seems determined to expose her and land her in trouble...  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: Night of Silence
description: When Leah finally returns to her small town after five years, she doesn't find the warm welcome she's expecting, as she opens the door to find her father's corpse hanging from the ceiling. The police rule it a suicide, but the longer she stays in town, the more she suspects that it was anything but. In the middle of it all is a violent book her father was writing called Battlegrounds, which has half of its pages missing. But the townsfolk don't appreciate Leah snooping around, and there's no limit to what they'll do to stop her from uncovering the truth.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: A DeadbEAT's Meal
description: What's better than a good meal? My name's Jaeho and I love food. While some may call me a deadbEAT because I don't have a job at the moment, I'm just your normal happy guy who loves eating and my girlfriend of 7 years... That is until I got a breakup text yesterday... Where did things go wrong? I keep trying to look back through the years, but I just can't figure it out...  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Shin Gumiho
description: Shin Gumiho (Shin meaning "new" and Gumiho meaning "old fox") begins with its origins based on Korean folklore. The 9-tailed demon fox, Gumiho, wishes to change into a human in order to keep her promise to the one she loved. However, right before she turns into a human, a vengeful demon-purger arrives and seals her into a sword. Now, in present day Korea, a young boy has found the sword and its contents. Gumiho is reawakened, but what will she do now? Be sure to find out in this wacky adventure.  (Source: MU)

title: I'll Choose My Husband
description: Adele Leopold has perished at the hand of the emperor three times now. As soon as her fourth life begins, she vows she won't go down the same path again. Filled with vengeance, Adele starts her new life with a plan to get back at those who wronged her. In all her lives, the one thing in common is that emperor wants her married into his family. This time, Adele will choose her husband and get the revenge she has been waiting for. But the person she decides to marry is no one anyone expected...  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Cigarette Burns
description: For over half his life, Neul Gye has devoted himself to the Baekya crime syndicate, serving as the personal ashtray for Inyeop Yong, the boss's son. With a body marked by cigarette burns and a tongue stripped of taste, Neul has resigned himself to this cruel existence. His only solace is that Inyeop has never violated his body further. But one day, an order sends Neul on a business trip, forcing him to confront a bloody past.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Yodong's Vampire
description: Meet Mr. Yodong Lee, a timid 27-year-old virgin who spends his days in a dull office job and quiet nights at home with the dog. In one day Yodong's life is turned upside-down when he takes in a poor orphan girl who magically transforms into a vampish vampire. Losing both his virginity and his dog to his new lover's voracious appetites, our protagonist is catapulted into a radical new world of danger and excitement. Faced with an oversexed boss who accuses him of sexual harassment, a sadistic ex-con with a pair of fang marks on his neck, and a lover with a strong aversion... or risk being sucked dry by a vampiric world.  (Source: Netcomics)

title: A Declaration of Revenge
description: A man named Lee Jung-yool appears out of nowhere in Han Gitae's detective agency, and Gitae suddenly finds himself under threats to cooperate with his plans...! What exactly is the massive conspiracy that involves the two of them? And what will become of these two?  (Source: Kidari Studio, translated)

title: Legendary Kang Do-Young
description: There was a legend about a guy named Kang Do-Young. He was perfect, great at sports, rich and good at fighting. Na Mirae was a girl who was the leader of a club called ‘Pink Lady’ and who also wanted to be Jiang of her whole school. For Do-Young, it was love at first sight while for Mirae, it wasn’t.  (Source: Fateful Encounters)

title: Aspirin
description: Ondal's task is to recapture the three demons that Tangun let loose. Of course, Ondal is not remotely capable of accomplishing the task. Therefore, Hemosu accompanies Ondal. Hemosu recruits his old student, David Copperfield who by the way Ondal thinks a gay, to the team. The team also encounters Samson, and she eventually joins the team after destruction of Vatican city. A little later, Pai and Pei join the team.  (Source: JanimeS)

title: Booty Camp
description: Ever find the one that got away? Harim and Eunju are old high school classmates who never got to fulfill their desires of being with each other. After graduating, they went their separate ways. But one day, they bump into each other and old flames get rekindled. Things are about to get hot and heavy, but there's just one thing. This stud has prioritized athletics above all else, meaning Eunju will have to show him the ropes in bed. Will they experience the ultimate high-intensity bedroom "booty camp" or will Harim's obsession with fitness get in the way of everything?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Living with Magicians
description: Living in the city can be tough. Living with magicians can be tougher. Rangse Enna worked hard to pass the government official exam. After being stationed to work for the government in the city, she bravely left her hometown... only to be housed with the magicians. The apartment seems to be full of strange magicians who operate differently from the people Rangse used to know. Will she be able to adjust to her new job, new city, and her new apartment?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Eyes
description: Juan Seo is a high school student who was born with just one eye. He has an uncanny feeling that someone is watching him every day at school. Even though he's scared to death, Juan can't help but be curious... Until one day, he learns of the "avian humanoids" and falls into a state of great confusion. In the midst of this blood curdling tension, the war of the avian humanoids is set in motion!  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Cheon Gi dot com
description: Jun Hui wakes up to find strange bruises on her body. She asks her childhood friend, Min Yu, the son of a fortune teller whose fortunes always seem to come true, what is going on. He tells her that she is linked with another spirit and that whatever happens to him happens to her.  It turns out that this spirit is Han Sung, who has the same bruises she has because he was in a fight the day before. She begins following him around in order to protect herself and he begins to think she likes him (although she couldn't care less about him).  (Source: MU)

title: Work Love Balance
description: Ahn Yiyoung has won big in both his career and love. Not only is the start-up company he started with his college friends thriving, but he's also dating SJ Group's talented director, Kang Daehyung. Well, "former" director, that is. After resigning from his position, Daehyung has been doing everything to be Yiyoung's perfect trophy boyfriend at home. But it won't be long until Daehyung is back to wearing his professional suits, now as the investor and director of Yiyoung's company! How will these two keep things balanced between work life and love life?  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: Excel
description: Excel is about a relationship between two sisters, Anri and Anji. Anri is one year older than Anji. Anri is a person with determination and guts, not to mention top grades and attitutde. Anji is a person with really nothing to offer. Anji can be quite mean and unreasonable. But, when it comes to down to her sibling, she can be pretty determined.  The story details the troubles that Anji has to go through because of Anri's two-faced boyfriend, Baek-Hui Kang.  (Source: JanimeS)

title: The Sacred Serpent's Seduction
description: How far would you be willing to go to save the ones you love? With his grandfather bordering life and death, Taesun takes on multiple jobs in order to pay a seemingly endless stack of hospital bills. On one of his odd jobs, he ascends the great mountain Geumryang, unknowingly the home of an eponymous serpentine spirit. When Taesun encounters the divine being, he too is on the brink of death, desperate for water in his slithering form. Taesun offers him a sip of water, and saves the sacred snake from certain death. Later that night, a cold-blooded body embraces Taesun and offers him an exchange: bear the ancient being's seed, and his grandfather will live. But is all really as it seems? After all, can one ever truly trust the forked tongue of a serpent...?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: A Handsome Swordsman
description: Moosung is an inn server with a huge crush on Soyeon, a beautiful woman from an influential family. Unfortunately, she's only willing to marry... a very handsome swordsman. Now Moosung's life mission is to become the best (and most handsome) martial artist in the world and win over Soyeon's heart. So he starts training hard, but it's not until he reads a book of secret martial arts skills that his true potential is magically unlocked. Can Moosung become a great martial artist, or will someone else swoop in and steal the love of his life?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: My Special Squishy Someone
description: After losing all hope of finding love, Ha-eun doesn't see the point of carrying on...until one day, a mysterious being saves her life and promises to make her irresistible to any man. Its method is unorthodox to say the least, but it sure makes her feel good.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Friday: Forbidden Tales
description: Every Friday, forbidden tales will be revealed.  (Source: LINE Webtoon)

title: Full House II
description: They say marriage is the happy ending of a beautiful love but isn’t it also the beginning of a new story? A year has passed since Ryder and Ellie got married. And our couple is still deeply is love with each other even though there are people who are still against their marriage. This story is a continuation from the original series, this time it is a journey for Ryder and Ellieo to find trust and love through many obstacles and hardships….

title: The Wicked Queen
description: There's a well-known saying that everyone living in the palace needs to know in order to survive: "If you see the Queen, you absolutely must avoid her!" Although the Queen is amazingly beautiful, she is a jealous woman. An uncountable number of people have fallen prey to that vicious and cruel person. However, all of the Queen's evil deeds were done with only one goal in mind—to hear the Emperor confesses his love and make her his Empress.  (Source: Kakao, translated)

title: Scroll If You Dare
description: An anthology of horror short stories by various authors.

title: Invincible Yeonbyeongeol
description: After losing her entire family to a mysterious fire, Soon-Doong refuses to wallow in sadness and decides to move to South Korea from her native Yanbian to find herself a new and better life. Holding nothing but a plane ticket to Korea, a small package of clothes, and a half-burnt letter between her grandfather and a "textile factory owner" in Seoul (who were good friends), she resolves to find a job at the factory and make a decent, honest living. Only, the "textile factory owner" just happens to be the CEO of the biggest clothing brand in the country, and her grandfather wasn't just a good friend with the "textile factory owner"—he had saved the CEO's life and lent him the money to start the business that he has today! And so begins Soon-Doong's life in Korea, as she shatters everyone's bigoted prejudice against ethnic Koreans who came from Yanbian and makes everyone rethink about their own values and lifestyles.  (Source: Hwang Mi Ri's Palace)

title: Savor the Taste
description: Can a princess's food save a kingdom?  Luana is reborn as an illegitimate princess inside a book. Resigned to her fate, she decides to spend her days cooking. Not long after, the cursed Duke Legion arrives and sacks the kingdom, but instead of falling for the princess, he's bewitched by Luana's food. He orders her to cook for him or die!  (Source: Manta)

title: Not Interested in Dating
description: "I want to live a simple life." Dohui wants to live as she always has, and her co-worker Dong-i likes to be alone. They have no intention of dating anyone in their workplace... Or do they? We invite you to the intimacy of two people who keep encountering each other.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Beautiful Gunbari
description: What if a woman goes to the army? Join Su-ah as she shares her personal experience of being part of the army in an action packed slice of life manhwa that shows you the true power of women!  (Source: MU)

title: Love Pop
description: Soda and Sukhee has known each other since they were little. Soda was the "hero" of the local kids, famous for her flying chicken attack. While Sukhee was the new kid in town who tried to take over the playground and ended up getting a good beating from Soda. What really is the fate between these two as Sukhee challenge Soda to a fight each and everyday?  (Source: Sensation Scans)

title: Sweet & Sensitive
description: Ee-Ji is a high school freshman with one best friend, three older brothers... and absolutely no interest in boys. That is, until she notices one of her classmates, Han-Kyul, for the first time, and figures out she knew him from school when they were kids. Now that she thinks about it, she liked him before and she starts to realize she likes him now. She finds it hard to deal with her feelings, especially when another classmate, Sae-Run, is always bugging her. Ee-Ji can't seem to figure out how to express herself, being so shy, sweet, and sensitive.  (Source: ANN)

title: The Events of Romeo's Household
description: O Romeo, Romeo! Where art thou, Romeo? Seriously, where the heck is he?! Secluded in his mansion, Romeo and his brilliant mind tug at the strings of power, unraveling the city's plots and mysteries. His loyal servants have guarded his secrets closely, but when someone new enters the household, they begin to question this self-inflicted isolation. Meanwhile, a wicked web looms large, beckoning Romeo to it. Will these threats thrust him back onto the public stage and bring dark truths to light?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Roureville
description: Evan Pryce is a celebrated New York Times reporter, and true to his prominent journalistic lineage, he has just published an exclusive scoop that is brilliant enough to be considered for the Pulitzer Prize. Unfortunately, this also makes him easy prey to the many enemies he has made throughout his career. Instead of going in hiding, however, Evan decides to hole up at his press office - not the safest place for a man in Evan's situation. Unwilling to have his star reporter remain so vulnerable to attack, the Editor-in-Chief orders Evan to cover an out-of-state story: "real" ghost sightings in a secluded village in the countryside—an article too absurd to be handled by the New York Times. For lack of a better thing to do, Evan decides to  follow his editor's orders and drives across the Midwestern desert searching for a town nobody seems to have heard of. After ten days of driving by sleepy rural villages with zero results, our lost and exhausted New Yorker is just about ready to give up. But then suddenly, a road sign pointing to "Roureville" catches his eye, and he heaves a sigh of relief. Little does he know that the end of his long road trip is just the beginning of an incredible tale.  (Source: Netcomics)

title: Not Your Monster-in-Law
description: Kim Hana is reincarnated as Wilhelmina, a fallen noblewoman whose fate takes a turn when she's married off to the wealthy House Layton. But there's a catch—her husband is already dead, leaving her to become the Dowager Duchess. Younger than her new stepson and his wife, she must navigate the treacherous waters of high society and a daughter-in-law determined to make her life miserable. Will she find a way to remedy this family drama or be unfairly painted as the monster-in-law she's not?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: My Stepdaughter Is a Bunny
description: Gloria wakes to find that she has become the infamous evil stepmother of a cute little werebunny?! She has mysteriously entered a fantastical world of knights and werebeasts, but not as its main character. Now, she must prove that she is not the terrible person everyone thinks she is. It won't be easy, but she has help. The World Tree's butterfly guardians will aid her in winning the trust of her new husband and stepdaughter.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Talent Agent and the Threads of Fate
description: Ever since former screenwriter, Injoon Kim, was nearly taken to the underworld by mistake, he has been able to see Threads of Fate—white where fortune awaits, and black where misfortune looms. This newfound ability quickly proves itself useful as Injoon becomes a manager in the entertainment industry and successfully saves the actress, Hye-ryung Yun, from a fatal accident. Will Injoon be able to use these Threads to his advantage and bring Hye-ryung to stardom?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Cairo
description: Destined to eternally rule over man as the human incarnation of Horus, the Pharaoh's current reincarnation isn't what it used to be for Cairo. The days get so routine and just plain boring. So when his attendant suggests dating, he gives it a shot. What could go wrong? Little does he know, a miffed rapper and his ex, the Sun god Ra, are determined to interfere in these matters of the heart.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Rubbing It In
description: In a pristine and upscale new city, which is home to many corporate elites, a mysterious massage shop opens. What sets it apart? Its owner, the sole masseur, who possesses a strikingly handsome figure and a perfectly sculpted physique. Yoona, one among countless lonely married individuals, wrestles with unfulfilled desires brought on by her workaholic husband's performance issues. When tales of this alluring new salon reach her ears, Yoona decides to pay a visit in search of the solace she craves...  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Adelia: Fetters of the Flower
description: Adelia Gerard had lost everything. The man she loved was dead, and her home was reduced to ashes. The person responsible for her misery? Her fiancé and crown prince of the empire, Elkarion Yearis. Heartbroken, Adelia vowed to knock him off his throne, but unbeknownst to her, the gears of fate had already begun to turn, sending her unexpectedly back in time. Now 19 again with her world back to normal, will Adelia be able to save her loved ones and bring down the crown prince once and for all?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Superior Day
description: What would you do if you found out that your neighbor is a serial killer? But more importantly: what would you do if some unknown third person was trying to make you kill him?!  (Source: MU)

title: Noise From Upstairs
description: What would you do if your neighbor didn't stop making noise? People think of Si-u Seo as a nice guy, but when his upstairs neighbor refuses to stop making noise, he gradually becomes consumed by his desire for revenge despite the fact that his neighbor is dangerous. Si-u will stop at nothing to ruin his neighbor's life, even if it means burning his own life to the ground.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!
description: Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.  "If I'm born again, I have to act," he promised and closed his eyes.  Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!  (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: Baby Dragon
description: Aileen de Sheia, who was reborn as a dragon, had the memory of a 19-year-old bullied school girl, Hui-joo Na. She's happy to feel the strong power that no one has experienced. She also felt the love and kindness of the people around me for the first time. As some make their every effort to have her, some also make their every effort to get rid of her.  (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: Doctor's Time Travel to Joseon
description: "Is this really Joseon?! But I still have lives to save!"  Baek Kang-hyuk, South Korea's top genius surgeon, finds himself transported to the Joseon era after touching a mysterious painting. And of all times... right before the outbreak of the Imjin War!  (Source: Naver, translated)

title: The Immoral Duke Needs to Be Homeschooled
description: Estella Margaret Montiel is a dedicated governess for House Bertha. However, she is currently facing more pressing matters than math or grammar. She knows her pupils' half-brother, Duke Diego Bertha, plans to kill everyone in his family! Determined to protect her students from a tragic fate, she sets out to reform the charming yet dangerous duke. Can her resolve and guidance truly transform the devilish Diego and teach him the value of family? Or will her class be dismissed much too early?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Before the Real Heroine Steps In
description: Once bitten, twice shy. That is Anastasia's motto when she awakes with a second chance in life as the empress in her favorite novel. After realizing that even true love cannot change destiny, Anastasia attempts to help her husband, the emperor, find his happy ending with the female protagonist—the true heroine of the story. However, it seems that the emperor has other thoughts. She pushes him away so they can both live, but the emperor is unsure if he wants to live without his queen.  (Source: NHN comico Corp.)

title: I Don't Want to Be a Lady
description: "I'll be the one calling the shots."  After enduring an upbringing full of torment, Lady Arianne refuses to be used as a means to anyone's end but her own. When her father moves to have her sold off as an additional mistress to the crown prince, she takes matters into her own hands by proposing a contract marriage with a duke instead!  (Source: Manta)

title: Monsters
description: The monster's blood in his veins exploded when he woke from death! Monsters that existed only in fairy tales appear in the middle of a city in the 21st century, break down buildings and harm humans. A group of humans with extraordinary abilities against them! The story of Naro, an outcast boy who fights against monsters.  (Source: MU)

title: Azure Night, Waltz of Rapture
description: When a night out to a piano recital turns into a literal nightmare for Seoyoon, she's unceremoniously inducted into a world of horrifying beings. There, she meets Heewon, a charming "superbia" who informs her that she is nothing more than food for these creatures born of sin. Now, she must succumb to the likes of vampires and incubi as they feed on her for sustenance. Can she escape the darkness that lurks under the cover of night, or will she find a reason to stay inside this sinister realm?  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: Space China Dress
description: Shaolin Space, a place that's said to be where all martial arts in the universe originated from. And within this planet... a most sacred place among martial artists, Mt. Kunlun. And on top of that Mt. Kunlun, there's Kunlun Headquarters. And if you go down... a long way, inside a small run-down dumpling restaurant, our heroine lives.

title: God-Tier Extra's Ultimate Guide
description: The protagonist, a jobless man barely scraping by with part-time work, drifts around like a wandering orphan. His only joy in an otherwise dull and unchanging life is the online game God-Forsaken World. To him, it's more than just entertainment—it's an escape from reality. Then one day, while immersed in the game, he hears a mysterious voice from nowhere. When he comes to... he finds himself inside the world of the game! You'd think that after being transported into a game, he would become a cool, powerful protagonist... but no. He wakes up as the Empire's disgrace and failure of a third prince: Gilroshan Elro de Valt. And if things couldn't get any worse, the moment he opens his eyes, someone tries to kill him! Trapped in the body of an overweight, pathetic prince scorned by all, the protagonist has one secret weapon: a strategy guide, the key to survival that only a veteran player like him possesses! With the stumbling prince, his loyal knight Carls, and his fearsome yet reliable mage mentor Tirvaen, a new adventure begins—one more intense than reality itself!  "Survive in the body of a good-for-nothing prince? It's not going to be as easy as playing the game."  This is an unpredictable fantasy full of laughs, battles, and non-stop survival action!  (Source: Kakao Entertainment, translated)

title: Herbal Bathhouse Tales
description: In a quiet countryside village lies an ancient, family-owned hot spring, passed down through generations. As it prepares for its grand reopening, Jinho is suddenly left to run the bathhouse alone. His only help? Sejeong, the gorgeous girl next door. As they work together to deep-clean the place, they stumble upon a mysterious bundle of herbs and an old medicinal book in the storage room. When they brew a vibrant, green herbal bath from the fragrant herbs, something unexpected begins to heat up—and it's not just the water!  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Imperfect Cinderella Story
description: Jung Eon is a maid who works in the house of a rich and powerful family. She dreams of escaping a life of servitude and saves every penny she earns. One day, she receives an unexpected proposal from her childhood friend and boss, Hyun Mae-hwa. He's as pretty as a flower, but has a horrible personality. Mae-hwa says he wants to marry her because of a prophecy that says Jung Eon has six benefactors in his destiny. She didn't realize it at the time, but the contract was truly unfair! Can Cinderella escape her unlucky prince?  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: Life, Once Again
description: Han Maru, an ordinary husband and father, dies tragically in an accident but is granted a second chance at life. With only vague memories of the past, he relives his high school days and rediscovers his passion for theater, a dream he once sacrificed. However, longing to find his wife and daughter again in this life, he fears choosing theater might steer him away from them. Juggling dreams and family, he navigates life's intricate choices, seeking fulfillment in this extraordinary second chance.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: The Extra's Touch
description: Muzel Clave Laurent Morze is destined to die during the war caused by the heroine of the novel "Mesiria." In order to avoid her horrid fate and live a carefree life, she decides to change the future with a special ability that allows her to look at the memories of people and objects with a single touch. She soon gets involved in the dramatic events of the original story in an attempt to make things go in her favor... but will her touch be enough to ensure the happy ending she's always wanted?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: This Life to the Next
description: Isaeng and Jeongto were inseparable childhood friends until Jeongto's father died tragically at the hands of a bitter soul. These two friends reunite ten years later as adversaries: Isaeng guides souls to the afterlife, while Jeongto gives souls another chance to live. After all this time, can these two work out their issues? And what do the Kings of Hell have to do with all of this?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: The Tale of the Skeleton Messenger
description: A hundred and twenty years after the Emperor's death, the Emperor's messenger and a Former member of the hero's party, Benrira, awakens. Having lost her beloved student to the corrupt fatherland, she decides to deliver the Emperor's final message.  "I am the messenger who delivers the Emperor's words. Heed the will of the First Emperor!"  (Source: Naver, translated)

title: Averted Gaze R
description: Dahye and Dawoon are siblings that live together with their parents. Their relationship is a bit rocky since Dawoon has always been their parents' favorite and Dahye holds some resentment towards him. Dawoon, who is a high school dropout, is always in his room playing games. Dahye starts noticing that he's acting weird, and after finding a disturbing story in her brother's computer, she starts fearing him and what he might be capable of doing. So she enlists the help of her aunt and best friend to try and find out what is wrong with Dawoon.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Say Love
description: A high school boy and a female student spend the night in a hotel after drinking a little much...  ... without being able to remember what may have happened between the two of them!  Three months later, the female student comes back to the young man telling him she might be...pregnant...?!

title: Lights Out
description: All Gun wanted to do was turn over a new leaf. A problem child since birth, Gun thought transferring to Northern Art High School and moving into the Lucky Residence would offer him a fresh start--a chance to begin again, away from his punch-drunk past.  He really should have known better. Whether it's having his attempts at romance with the lovely Seung-Ah thwarted time and time again by the lusty Ji-Ae, putting up with deliveryman Sung-Rae's dreams of heavy metal stardom, or dealing with Northern Art's gangs, Gun is going to have a very hard time shaking off his past. However, it's something he must do if he's to look towards the future, and Gun's future is a bright one indeed.  For on the hard asphalt surface of a bike track, Gun will finally lose his apathy and find himself. On the back of a motorcycle, Gun's life finally has purpose, and it's a purpose that will not be fulfilled, at least in Gun's eyes, until he's taken the checkered flag in the Korean Grand Prix.  (Source: MU)

title: Taming My Master Mage
description: Kinemia Lyon's got two rules for surviving a novel: recruit talented geniuses to save her territory and don't get involved with Ayan Krotz, a dangerous mage. But when Ayan gets captured for trespassing on her land over and over again, she decides to hire him as her bodyguard instead. Unfortunately, letting Ayan into her life means dealing with his erratic magic and even more concerning personality! Can Kinemia come to tame this master mage? Or will she regret not kicking him out for good?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: The Dying Emperor's Personal Physician
description: Executed for failing to save the emperor, Serena Vincent wakes up again and again on the day she's assigned as his physician. Azaid Khan Krothen, the emperor's bastard son from a lowly maid, was cast aside at birth. But he now sits on a throne others want to control. As Serena races to cure his mysterious illness, each failure ends in her death. Trapped in a deadly loop, she must find the cure to the emperor's illness... before her next death is her last.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Magic-Girl Service
description: One day, Kim Namjoo is forcibly transformed into a mascot by 'Seobi,' a being who came from Fairyland. He now has the duty to gather sorcerer girls who possess the power of love to defeat the demons, creatures born from sexual desire, that are invading Earth...! But to truly purify the demons, he needs to fulfill the desires of both the sorcerer girls and the monsters to cleanse them...?! Can Kim Namjoo purify the demons that are trying to conquer Earth and restore peace to the world?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: The Villainess's Road to Revenge
description: To support the family after her father's untimely death, Milvia sacrifices her life force to make gold using the forbidden practice of alchemy. But after being accused of trying to kill her stepsister, Relliana, she is sentenced to death. Just before taking her last breath, Milvia realizes she's been betrayed by her own family and is mysteriously given a second chance at life. Now, with the help of a knight named Deus, she's determined to get revenge, but things are not as simple as they seem...  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Feeding the Lives of Failing Idols
description: Im Hyunsung was a famous chef and restaurateur until he met his untimely death at the hands of his family. In his final moments, he is given the chance to get revenge, but only if he completes a special quest: save the failing idol group Climax as its leader, Cheon Yise! Equipped with Hyunsung's entrepreneurial and cooking skills, will Yise pull the group together and help Climax rise to the top for a successful comeback? Or will the group—and his new life—be on the chopping block?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: The Greatest Heiress of the Empire
description: Estelle was a woman who suffered from a stigmatized disease. One day, upon seeing the main protagonist Ceria, Estelle realizes that she has become the extra in a novel. Kicked out of her home as a child for being switched with a maid's child, Estelle is saved by the Valois brothers and begins to fall in love with Claude, the male protagonist who is supposed to be connected to the protagonist, Ceria...  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: Choose Your Heroes Carefully
description: Stuck in a game with a lousy hero? Me too!  Minjoon, a normal office worker, wakes up inside the game he was reviewing for his friend. It's not his fault the trailer was so boring it put him to sleep! Bewildered, Minjoon is tasked with summoning a hero to guide. The hero certainly looks strong, but he seems to be less useful than expected.  (Source: Manta)

title: My Dazzling Downfall
description: Almost overnight, Graciella Wasslet went from being a princess to being a criminal in exile. Now, she lives on an island with her trusty maid under the constant surveillance of her vengeful brother. When she encounters a rival empire's prince, she hatches a plan to win his trust and start anew in his land. However, it seems that there may be a dark history behind his stay on the island, too. With the odds stacked against them, can these outcasts really escape to a better life?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: The Wizard Is Poor
description: Be it forte or skill, the wizard Elena's capabilities are all top-notch. However, even Elena has a few flaws—her poverty and immense debt!! And the most devastating of her flaws is the fact that jewels are her medium for magic. Then, one day, she is recruited by the greatest household in the Borina Empire, the Mayfield Duchy, as an exclusively contracted wizard. At the thought of being able to pay back all her debts at once, Elena accepts the offer.  However, protecting the duchy, which stands at odds with the empress, is harder than expected. To make things worse, the duke of Mayfield, Cedric, who thinks of wizards as less than bugs, is turning out to be an obstacle for Elena. Will the opportunistic wizard Elena be able to safely complete her task?  (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: Grand Chase
description: Kaze'aze managed to infiltrate the Kanavan  Kingdom by murdering the Kanavan Queen's most loyal and trusted retainer, and then disguising herself as him. As a result, Kaze'aze was able to get close to the Queen and entice her with the ways of darkness. Kaze'aze blinded the Queen of Kanavan's eyes to truth and led her to wage a five-year war against the Serdin Kingdom. All of Bermesiah  Continent was devastated; many heroes fell in battle, and even the Queen of Serdin sacrificed her life in hopes of ending the fighting.  The death of the Queen of Serdin broke Kaze'aze's hold over the Queen of Kanavan, who, after finally regaining her senses, erupted with fury over Kaze'aze's treachery. Kaze'aze escaped before the Queen of Kanavan could execute her. This lead the Queen to dispatch Trackers to punish the Queen of Darkness. But after years of searching, she was nowhere to be found and the Queen's Trackers vanished as well; forcing the Queen of Kanavan to abandon her search.  The Serdin Kingdom experienced a series of bizarre incidents related to Kaze'aze after the Five-Year War: these events revealed that Kaze'aze manipulated the Kanavan and Serdin Kingdoms into fighting each other. The newly appointed Queen of Serdin is now determined to prevent Kaze'aze from starting another war between the two kingdoms for the sake of the entire continent. The Queen of Serdin has prepared to confront Kaze'aze and counter her evil plans by organizing Grand Chase, an elite corps that will fight for all of Bermesiah.   (Source: Grand Chase Wikia)

title: Void's Enigmatic Mansion
description: What if your greatest wish could be granted?  The enigmatic mansion on 6 Roland Street belongs to one Mr. Void, who resides on the seventh floor. Unbeknownst to the rest of the tenants in Void's mansion, their greatest wishes could be granted. And as the stories of the residents intertwine, they soon learn that what they desire is not always what is best...  (Source: Yen Press)

title: My Sadistic Master
description: Jin Yu-an is a shy, sweet-faced sub who's never actually tried any real SM play. He's never had a partner or a lover—mostly because he's way too busy, kind of a scaredy-cat, and hasn't found anyone who fits his taste.  One day, while browsing a BDSM app, he stumbles upon a profile that makes his heart race... only to realize the guy hasn't logged in for years. Still, hoping against hope, Yuan starts sending him cheerful messages. And then—a reply.  [You got a death wish? Can't you see my age?]  Oops. He missed the guy's age. And the terrifying attitude in the response? Yikes. But somehow, Yuan gets stubborn and insists on meeting him. The guy is exactly his type—intense gaze, scary tattoos, and an aura that screams danger.  BDSM? More like organ theft??   Still... should he give this scary-sexy dom a shot?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Sparkle x Sparkle
description: A college girl finds her ideal guy. There is just one problem though. The guy's younger than her. In fact, he's in high school!  (Source: MU)

title: Last Fantasy
description: Tian and Drei von Richenstein, two unlikely heroes, embark on an adventure filled with excitement, intrigue, and comic relief. Their adventures are complicated by the fact that they have a knack for making allies into new enemies...  (Source: Tokyopop)

title: Getting to Know Grace
description: Andrew is the only daughter of the famous Grace family. She also has an incurable disease. Due to her family's high status in society, Andrew grew up with no friends save for her maid, Herta, whom she has become intensely infatuated with. Little does she know, her family is responsible for ruining Herta's life. Can Andrew break the hierarchy and be with her? Or will Herta end her suffering first...  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Holding You Close
description: After three failed marriages, Archduke Theo de Phoenix has long accepted that love simply isn't in the cards for him. After all, who could love a war-hardened monster like him? So when his fourth bride arrives, he greets her covered in blood, gives her a shabby attic for a room, and keeps his distance. Surely, this one will run too. But Yuelina is not like the others. To Theo's disbelief, she welcomes his presence and fills his cold world with warmth and light. As the walls around his heart begin to thaw, will Theo finally allow himself to love?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Chiller
description: An anthology of horror short stories by various authors.

title: Eunsuk & Jung-gu
description: Eunsuk and Jung-gu have a complicated relationship. The easiest way to describe it would be "roommates." Of course, not all roommates have sex. And most of them don't visit bathhouses together. And only a small few of them have sex at bathhouses.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Elskar
description: Hidden deep within the sanctuary of the forest lives the Rangae species, who form a precious jewel within their hearts once they reach adulthood. Viola, a young Rangae, has yet to form one when her village is attacked by human hunters. Due to her shocking resemblance to the late empress, she is rescued by Duke Khalid Alec Droy and assigned to serve the fifth imperial prince. Faced with the cruel hierarchy of high society and palace life, can Viola overcome her hatred of humans and discover the mysterious duke's true intentions?  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: The Beautiful Curse
description: Travelers come to a village in search of fairies. (Source: MegKF)

title: Celeb Lady
description: The ugly duckling becomes the empire's top celebrity!  Juliet Karenina, the era's hottest celebrity, wakes up in the body of noblewoman Louvetria Diollus in another world. Faced with a clumsy body and a timid personality, Louvetria endures bullying from those around her. There are twins who mock and ostracize her. Her unrequited love, Kedric, scowls at her. Her step-grandmother, Molga, torments her in secret. But with Juliet's spirit inside her, Louvetria won't tolerate it anymore.  "I won't stand for this, no matter who it is." Louvetria's bold transformation begins!  (Source: Lua Scans)

title: Corrupting the Heroine's First Love
description: In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.  Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?  (Source: WordExcerpt)

title: The Girl That Lingers in the Wall
description: After losing all his savings in a rental scam, Sulki miraculously finds a brand new apartment at a price too good to be true. Little does he know the place is haunted by a ghost who's hell bent on sucking out his energy—whether it be by playing tricks on him with dirty dreams or possessing other people in his life.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Blunder Turned Wonder
description: Minkyu's heart is pounding in his ears as he waits for Jung-yun, his dream girl, up on the roof of the school. Today, he got her number off the class contact list and finally mustered up the courage to text her. Now all he has to do is ask her out. Minkyu hears the door creak. Jung-yun's here! Too embarrassed to look her in the eye, he blurts out his feelings for her and pops the question. "Okay," a guy who is definitely not Jung-yun answers. Startled, Minkyu turns around to find Jung-hyun with an "h" blushing in front of him. Wait, wait, waaaait... Did he just ask out a dude? And did the dude just say yes? Does that mean he now has a 192 cm-tall, curtain-haired boyfriend? What the heck is going on?!  (Source: Lezhin Comics)

title: Crimson Karma
description: Kasiya, a fearless warrior, embarks on a daring solo mission to take down the enemy's most powerful leader. Little does she know that the very allies she trusted have set this mission as a trap, which leaves her fighting for her life. When Kasiya awakens from one perilous encounter, the world around her has transformed into a realm teeming with knights, sorcerers, and royalty. Suddenly thrust into this dangerous dimension, she must unlock the secrets of this new realm in order to survive as it tests her skills, courage, and cunning.  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: Rookie Employee Kim Cheolsu
description: On the day he was rejected by the company he had devoted his life to, he went back to the moment of his first day at work. Kim Cheol-su, a low-spec rookie employee who joined Han-young, a leading domestic company. Can he finally achieve his long-desired position as the "CEO" in this lifetime?  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: Moonchild
description: Since childhood, Bak-ha has been able to see "things" that others can't. On the first day at his new school, Bak-ha meets Jindo, and due to the sickeningly sweet smell Bak-ha has, Jindo notices he is different, just like himself. As they get closer, Bak-ha finds out that he was the moonchild, the mythical creature who ruled the spirits in the past, and realizes that this is why the ghosts and demons are after him.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Taming My Boss
description: Eun-hyeon is the promising young CEO of RedFit, a vastly successful gaming company. But while he's got the looks and the status, he's also a chronic workaholic with a mean mouth, and his employees are always busy avoiding him. His secretary, Ms. Han, is the only one who seems to be capable of dealing with his insensible remarks... But even she has her limits. Having had enough of his tyranny, she storms inside his office ready to quit—completely oblivious to the words that would soon come out of her irritable boss' mouth.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Back to the Highteen
description: At the age of 27, Boyoung's reached an all time low. She's just been dumped, scammed, and still hasn't graduated from college. When she's offered the chance to go back to high school in return for a large sum of money, she can't resist. All she has to do is make sure nobody finds out. Shouldn't be hard... right?  (Source: Manta)

title: Daily Witch
description: Once upon a time, women with extraordinary abilities appeared, earning the praise of many. However, such respect soon turned into rejection, and they were forced into hiding. Now, these so-called witches live in groups to protect themselves from discrimination and harm. A witch named Eve resides with three other women: Misty, a boys' love enthusiast; Gretel, a wandering witch who studies odd animals; and Baba Yaga, an eerie, unmoving doll that may be one of the oldest and most powerful witches of their time.  Fueled by hate and prejudice, witch hunters appeared, though their objectives have shifted with time. They no longer aim to eradicate witches but to abuse their magic instead. One witch hunter organization has set its sights on Misty, and when they manage to abduct her, Eve desperately tries to summon all her roommates and flies to Misty's aid. However, the simple rescue mission introduces the young witches to others of their kind, and their escapade to free Misty brings them closer together in unexpected ways.  [Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Drama Writer Who Reads Spoilers
description: Sixth year drama assistant writer Jang Yeon-jae. He desperately wanted and tried, but ahead of his debut, his teacher the main writer Kim Tae-jin stole his script.  "Sir! How could you do this! That's my script!" "Yeon-jae. It is true that I was a little influenced by your ideas. But that is definitely my work."  After leaving the assistant writer job out of anger, he looked for a way to knock Kim Tae-jin down, but there seemed to be no hope. But at that moment... A miracle happened.  [You can purchase 200 characters of the script with a rating of 0.1%.] [When broadcasting with this script, the expected average rating is 15.2%.]  [Do you want to buy?] [Yes / No]  A must-watch the moment it airs! Assistant writer Jang Yeon-jae's high-rating drama, Drama Writer Who Reads Spoilers!  (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: The Genius Blacksmith's Game
description: The world's last blacksmith and master craftsman. When a forge fire damages his hands, making him unable to craft anymore... That's when the virtual reality game "Ares" comes to Hyun-su.  [Unrepairable artifact.] [Cannot craft due to level restrictions.]  "Huh? I'm a manual blacksmith, so I can do it though?" No system restrictions apply to him. The eventful game of a genius blacksmith begins.  (Source: Kakao Entertainment, translated)

title: This Life's Universal Superstar
description: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared!  "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone."  His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem.  The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting "The New Black." This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!  (Source: Kakao Entertainment, translated)

title: Today I Live with You
description: "Fine! I'll start dating then!!" Dohee has a crush on childhood friend Jaehyuk. But in order to distance herself from him, she has decided to start dating others when the handsome lunatic Wonyoung appears! Wonyoung's constant antics slowly start to rub off on Dohee... will Dohee be able to start a relationship in her eventful campus life?  (Source: Copin Communications)

title: The Rib of Adam
description: Taeyoung has always treated girls like crap. But after waking up one day to find a "lady-hole" on his ribcage, he slowly starts to gain a deeper understanding of the female experience. And luckily (or not) his ex-girlfriend is on-hand to speed up the process. Join Lizzy as she drags Taeyoung on a depraved journey of sexual discovery...  (Source: Lezhin Comics)

title: Danzi
description: Danzi, 31, has been living alone now for around 10 months when a sudden call from her mother brings back memories of why she moved out in the first place. In her eponymous comic, Danzi uses her personal diaries to recount her experience growing up with two brothers and emotionally abusive parents. An instant hit in South Korea, this comic confronts issues such as sexism and domestic violence in a way that's inviting, albeit heartbreaking.  (Source: Lezhin Comics)

title: Joystick Joyride
description: Minchan has always harbored a secret crush on his friend Ah-yeon, known as a goddess within their department at college. Despite his shabby appearance, her undeniable beauty leads him to swallow his pride and ask her over for drinks. On that fateful evening, the two are hanging out at his place when the atmosphere heats up. Just as they are about to take things to the next level, a shocking revelation shatters the moment: Minchan is disappointingly small. Devastated by Ah-yeon's harsh words, Minchan contemplates taking things to the extreme, but even in despair, he lacks the courage to follow through. Just when he is trapped in a hopeless limbo, the most unbelievable game falls into his hands, promising a fantastical journey of unexpected twists and turns. Will Minchan find a way to level up his confidence and change his fate?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Where the Dragon's Rain Falls
description: According to legend, a nation in which a dragon appears is destined for prosperity. Finally a new dragon is born in the desert-covered empire Rahan, but...as a fragile young boy! Until the boy comes of age, the crown prince orders him hidden away in the depths of the palace. But one night, Suu, a lowly palace servant hoping to run away with his dear Nadan, stumbles upon an unexpected mystery... And so begins their tale of love, obsession...  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: Divorce Is Easy, but Love Is Hard
description: Ji Sina, a senior attorney at K Law Firm, is full of ambition. In order to proudly inherit her father's law firm in the future, she went through a difficult road and finally sat down as a partner lawyer, but she was then told that a guy like a horse snatched the position, the same one which had witnessed her dark history from her 20's. Sina, who is nice and kind to everyone, only has one man she can never get close to, and the person in all of these positions is Ryu Kanghyun. Seduce such a person and say that you will inherit the law firm only if you succeed in marriage?  "I have a lot of divorce experience, but I don't know much about dating!" The romance between Sina, an ambitious woman who doesn't know where to go, and Kanghyun, a senior who doesn't know what's going on, begins.  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: The Stand Up Guy
description: By anyone's standards, Minhyeok is a good egg: he's a reliable coworker, a faithful fiancé... a real stand up guy! The future looks rosy until one day he's unceremoniously dumped by his future wife. As his dreams of domestic bliss go up in flames, Minhyeok goes off the rails. Strange thing is, his new devil-may-care attitude goes down extremely well with the ladies. And there are plenty of stunners around him who have been biding their time, waiting to pounce. Soon enough, Minhyeok learns that when the chips are down, you gotta rise to the occasion!  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Hero Waltz
description: Go Sung-tae is the target of the bullies in his school... voluntarily. He is a part of a secret experiment by the government that aims to produce "Heroes" in hope of rivalling the other countries. Not wanting to get involved, he steers away from the prying eyes of the government by keeping a low-profile, being the "timid" kid.  The most popular girl in his school, with a strong sense of justice decides to follow him with the intention of helping him, only to discover that he was faking his personality. (On top of that, his secret got revealed.) What will happen to Sung-tae now?  (Source: MU)

title: G-School
description: Soryun isn't like any high schooler; he hails from a shaman family. He's usually discrete with his powers, but he's going to have to reveal them to hunt ghosts and other entities that haunt the school.

title: Ugly Duckling Complex
description: Ajin is a carefree high school girl interested only in baking and is a loyal friend who values her bonds above all. Despite her ordinary appearance, she garners the interest of Junu, one of the most handsome guys at her school, adding a newfound excitement and unpredictability into her life. Will they be able to overcome the jealous manipulations of others and realize their feelings for each other?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: The Acting Empress Still Spends the First Night
description: Zelda von Trova never wanted the title of Acting Empress, but when she's forced to wed the Emperor of the Raphion Empire in place of the runaway princess, she has no choice. Yet after sharing the first night with him, her divorce plans begin to waver. As their attraction grows, Zelda's heart is torn— will she be able to walk away when the time comes, or will love unravel all her plans?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: My Prince's Healing Touch
description: As the male lead's older sister, Edna Luschen Demirette is destined to die from the void virus, a dangerous disease with no cure. Fortunately, Edna discovers that the virus can be purified by touching Prince Carlen, a poor outcast with divine powers. But as simple as that sounds, Edna's plans to befriend him go awry when he mistakes her for an obsessive fan during their first meeting. Armed with nothing but her sharp wits, will Edna successfully persuade the cold prince and save herself?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: They're Not Kissing, and a Cat
description: Hee-Yul Yoon has just moved back from America to Korea with her sister, Suh Hee Yoon. She is determined to deal with her hard past by leaving behind her aunt, uncle and her friend Ricky Ha. After buying a pack of cigarettes she bumps into a handsome boy. And then all of a sudden he kisses her! Who is this annoying bastard and what's his deal?! You had better believe that our heroine Hee-Yul will get to the bottom of this!  (Source: Lunar Ageha Scans)

title: Wild Ranker
description: A blinding flash of light, and his village was gone. Lowe vows to reach the floating Island of the Gods, but first, he must venture into a world ruled by a ranking system and claw his way to the top. Trained by the world's strongest knight, he embarks on a quest to become the top ranker, battling fearsome beasts and ruthless rivals to uncover the truth and save his loved ones.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: I'm Finding a New Husband
description: Riat, caught up in her husband's treason, faces death. After repeatedly returning to the past at the cost of half her lifespan, she finally breaks the cycle by offering her husband's head to the emperor. With only one year and three months left to live, her one wish is—"I'm going to fall in love."  At last, an announcement spreads across the entire empire: a competition to find Riat's new husband, with a grand prize of one billion gold. Candidates begin to flood in, but suspicious figures also start gathering around her...  (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: Guardians of the Lamb
description: Hari's normal. Sure, she can't remember anything from when she was a child, but apart from that, she's just a relatively unknown actress who dreams of making it big. All is well. That is, until she gets kidnapped. Luckily, Hari manages to emerge from that incident relatively unscathed, but... Why is the man who saved her following her around? What does a missing person's case from twenty years ago have to do with anything? What secrets will be unearthed from Hari's missing memories?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Electrifying Confession
description: "They say falling in love is exhilarating... but this isn't it!" Hari is cursed by unrequited love, and Yura wants to borrow the curse. Will Hari confess to her crush, Jungwon? Or will she give up her unrequited love? The thrilling story of Hari's first love begins!  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: Kill Me With Kindness
description: "Please die," they said. These were words from comrades she'd fought beside for a decade. "I'm sorry, Rin. For the sake of the world, you must be the one to die." And as everything faded away, she felt it was truly the end.  "...Huh?"  Rin opened her eyes again. Thirty years had passed, and she'd awakened as the illegitimate child of the Tusrina family—now known as the Apostle of the Gods!  "You are an exceptional talent. It would be a waste to let you wither away here. Would you come with me?" Rin stared at the man holding out his hand. It was one of the four heroes celebrated by the world—the very one who'd betrayed her in her past life, now attempting to adopt her because she resembled his old comrade's swordsmanship.  Are you insane? As if I'd ever let you adopt me!  (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: Be RF Savvy or Die
description: What could make a romance fantasy superfan happier than getting pulled into a fantasy world? But Daline Este's dreams of being the protagonist in her story come crashing down when reality sinks in. She hasn't been pulled into one of her favorite novels like she dreamed—instead, she's landed in a world on the cusp of crisis as several novels tangle together and threaten to tear it apart. Now, Daline must use her expertise to set the stories straight before her happy ending goes up in flames.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Please Become My Sister-in-Law!
description: "So, what do you think about my brother?"  One day, out of nowhere, a charming princess appeared in the life of Claire, the mistreated protagonist of an unknown author's work. Princess Yuri, without any prior connection, unexpectedly proposed that Claire marry her brother—known as the empire's most eligible bachelor. Overwhelmed by the princess's stubbornness, which not even the emperor could sway, Claire found herself in a contract engagement with the second prince.  "I just want you to play along until Princess Yuri is satisfied. I'll make sure you're compensated accordingly."  As Claire waited for the contract to end, Prince Raymond began to approach her. Why would someone who is only tied to her by a contract...?  "I don't want to let you go. I feel like locking you away so you can't leave."  For Claire, who fears both giving and receiving love, the wave of affection from her potential in-laws has only just begun.  (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: The Raider
description: After the appearance of monsters that tear humans apart, society has divided into two parts, "Raiders" and "Non-Raiders." 24-year-old Lee Semin, unable to become a Raider no matter how hard he tries, confines himself to a small room. One day, he stumbles upon a strange website.  [Welcome, new member. To Transcendental Network. A community connecting transcendent beings across dimensions.]  They reveal to him the true world of martial prowess. Amidst the chaos where humans and monsters are indistinguishable, the "True Raider" is about to make their entrance!  "Bring it on, you bastards."  (Source: Kakao Entertainment, translated)

title: Traces of the Moon
description: One would think Asina has it all as the daughter of Cromwall's archduke, but a serious case of the travel bug has her ditch her comfortable estate for the beautiful but deadly desert. Unfortunately, the first person she meets there happens to be Sihad Zain Behdad, the king of Cromwall's enemy nation, Pesian. First, he throws her in prison because he finds her suspicious. Then, he captures her when she breaks out and throws her in his harem! Can Asina hide her identity long enough to escape from the Sihad, or will she fall prey to the aloof king's unexpected charm?  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: The Rabbit Hole
description: Whatever her employer asks, Hee-Yeon, the maid, does it perfectly without any mistake. A beautiful yet twisted maid enters a complicated household. How far down the rabbit hole will Hee-Yeon go?  (Source: Lezhin Comics)

title: Dayseller
description: Creeping the earth's surface, mysterious invisible beings known as Daysellers shadow the most miserable humans, preying on their despair and suffering. They move from one woeful mind to another to explore and devour it, as only the deepest, darkest, and most twisted fractions of humans' depressing nature make the most appetizing feast.  Daysellers are known to push people over the edge to sweeten their meals, but sometimes, one particular Dayseller takes pity on an unfortunate person it stalks and whispers words of hope to help end the pain.  [Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Circle Zero: Otherworldly Hero Business
description: Young, successful, ambitious. The young CEO was born to conquer. After his untimely death, he wakes up in an alternate world as the eldest daughter of Count Hall McGrewd. "I may be in a damsel's body, but you won't find me in any distress!" Follow the newly reborn Farrell Hall McGrewd as she begins to take over in the other world of nobles and magic.  (Source: NHN comico Corp.)

title: Beasts of Desire
description: Power. Pleasure. Both can drive one's humanity to its extremes. So when Jin Hyeon-jin, president of the prestigious Jinhwa Company, is suddenly found dead, his son Sihyeon can't help but to question everyone around him. Most suspicious of all is Kang Seung-tae, a recent external hire who is shrouded in mystery; yet this cold and calculating figure may be Sihyeon's only hope for discovering what really happened on that fateful night. And so, he proposes a deal...he will help Seung-tae become the successor to Jinhwa if the latter is able to get to the bottom of his father's fateful demise. But words alone will not be enough to convince the enigmatic-yet-carnal Kang, who desires more: "You. Your life. Your everything. That is what you bring to the table."  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: I Killed Him
description: Attorney Kim Mooil usually only takes simple copyright cases to keep his practice afloat, so when his landlord comes to him and confesses to killing one of his tenants, Mooil thinks it'll be an open-and-shut case. But the day before they're to go to the police, his landlord seemingly takes his own life. As Mooil and his team of sleuths try to solve this mystery, he learns the incident may be linked to a police cover-up, revenge porn, and a murder from seven years ago. So much for open-and-shut!  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Chunshik the Old Newbie
description: Chunshik Kim is the CEO of Novis Company, the company behind the VR RPG Novis World, but he has never played his own game before. After claiming that he could become a top ranker without paying any money at an update preview event, he starts Novis World with only his secretary and passion by his side. Will this old dog be able to learn new tricks and become the top ranker in Novis World?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Temptress
description: Haeyo can't help herself—she gets aroused whenever, wherever. Whether she's on her way home, in the gym, or in a bar, she's ready to entice anyone who's brave enough to accept her advances. Equipped with a sultry stare, she woos unsuspecting targets who can't say no after getting a glimpse of what she has to offer. Well... Are you ready to get tempted?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Netkama PUNCH!!!
description: Netkama—a male who portrays himself as female online. This is what Kim Seyeong decides to become after reencountering Shin Heejae, the guy who destroyed Seyeong's gaming career in "Arcadia" a year prior. His plan is to pretend to be a girl in the game, get Heejae to fall for him, and then make the big reveal to everyone so that his archnemesis will also be humiliated out of "Arcadia" forever. But being a dude trying to become the girlfriend of your worst enemy is no easy feat, especially more so when said worst enemy starts to show a bit too much interest in you. Will Seyeong come out the victor of this scheme? Or will he find himself losing to Heejae all over again?  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: Peace Restaurant
description: Chef Sua, with her unrivaled culinary skills, doesn't just rule over Peace Restaurant, Seoul's most peculiar eatery—she weaves harmony between cosmic enemies now seated as tablemates. The tension in her restaurant simmers not from culinary rivalry but from the precarious peace among patrons from warring dimensions. Will Sua's culinary diplomacy be enough to maintain this balance, or is her restaurant destined to become the epicenter of an ultimate showdown?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Love and Let Lie
description: Taeyoung's life takes an unexpected turn when he's taken in by the secretary to the chairman of one of Korea's most powerful conglomerates, H Corporation. Though grateful for this fortune, he's determined to build his own path, without relying on anyone for anything. While he leads what seems like an ordinary life, he holds a secret longing within—the desire to reunite with his first love. Pervasive thoughts of the mysterious man have consumed his mind since the day they crossed paths as children. But when the two meet again by chance, he discovers a disappointing truth: his cherished first love is Heo Minjae, the reckless black sheep of the H Corporation's main family. Can Taeyoung find the sweet guy he fell in love with, or is the Minjae from his past lost forever?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Path to Vengeance
description: Cha Chan-ok is a man in his forties that grew up believing that happiness shared is doubled and and sadness shared is halved. He is a good man that helps whenever and whoever. But that has come to bite him in the ass. After his father's death, he has everything taken away from him—wealth, power, status, friends and even his family. However, his good disposition didn't bring only misfortune. In the past, he ended up saving a young girl called Jae-hee. And after a traumatic event lands Chan-ok in the hospital, she's the only one willing to help him turn things around. But his path to vengeance might not be as smooth as he'd like. Love, sex, betrayal and blackmail will all be part of the game.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Sleeping with the Enemy
description: "Do you have any thoughts of becoming an actor? I can't see anyone but you from far away." God's hands in the entertainment industry, golden eyes, Iyeon Shin. The person she cast always became a big star. In a few years, she fell in love with the person she street casted, Taejin Yeo. Beautiful face and perfect body shape, no matter what anyone says, he'll be a great actor! However, she didn't know that he's the CEO of her competitor, Jin Entertainment. She didn't know that he was a spy who came to steal her casting secrets. "Maybe i didn't recognize your star sense from the beginning, instead I fell in love with you at the first sight?" "The thing I was curious about, was it the secret of SINI Ent. casting, or was it you, Iyeon Shin?" Their cheerful and lively love story, full of confusion and sweetness!  (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: 0.0000001% Demon Lord
description: Demon King Astrea tasked 72 worthy Demon Lords with destroying the world. Demon Lords—a title only given to those who passed Astrea's test. Each was given powers befitting their title. Kharos, the ruler of madness and greed, was no exception. But his granted power was less than satisfactory. He received the power of "Gacha"—a luck-based ability with an abysmal pull rate. With this power, Kharos must do his best to engulf the world with madness and greed!  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Be My Boomer
description: Falling head over heels for your professor at first sight and then deciding to woo him is not the best idea, but Hansol is willing to make terrible life choices for the sake of love. But then it turns out, Professor Minjoon Baek is the boomer to end all boomers. Is his stuck-up mindset going to ruin this romance, or can Hansol overcome this unexpected obstacle?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Sacred Life of a Webcomic Artist
description: Imagine you were a once-famous adult webcomic artist going through a career slump. Would you rather work with your stunningly sexy but jerk of a producer, Jooho, or your first love and story writer, Minjoon? Well, Hayoon has to work with both! With bills to pay and nothing but ramyun to eat after a string of failed series, Hayoon must successfully launch a new title with both of them on her team. Will she be able to navigate this professional nightmare and revive her career with a bang? And which man will end up taking the spot of her male lead?  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: Milky Boy
description: CheSuBin, a sparkling high school girl with a height complex has been launched into the modeling industry. There is just one little problem... she has to pose as a male model. What kind of misfortune has fallen upon her? It might be considered fortunate, but for the girl, it's just a lot of stress. Her fellow student and CF model, GanUnKyuk, just might trigger her love someday. "For you to see my true feelings, would my pitiful self end up hurting?!"  (Source: Forbidden Garden)

title: The Boss in the Bedroom
description: Director Goo, leader of Sales team 3 at Yeong-rong Corporation, is very adamant about keeping his personal life and his private life separate. At the office, he's a notoriously no-nonsense boss who can't stand sloppy work, especially from employees who got into the company using personal connections. When he's off the clock, he becomes Young-Jo; the college aged, regular customer at S&M lounge bar who loves being degraded and abused in the bedroom. On a night out, he hooks up with an alluring, extremely wealthy party boy who turns out to have sadistic sexual tendencies. After thoroughly enjoying a night filled with pain and pleasure, he returns to work the next day to find a nightmare situation awaiting him. Who knew the sales team 3 latest recruit would be the company CEO's son. And to make matters worse, he's the same man from the night before who had Young-jo crying out and moaning the word "hyung..."  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Ordinary Men
description: Life as a nurse is crazy enough, but throw a cute doctor into the mix, and things start to get a little tricky. Especially if that cute doctor tries to work his charm on you every chance he gets. Those puppy eyes...tousled brown hair...and blue scrubs! How could anyone resist?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Moralless Scandal
description: Lorena chose death to take revenge on the husband who ruined her life. Thrown back in time, she is determined to rewrite her destiny, protect her family, and destroy her husband. There's only one way to win: a scandalous divorce. "I need a wild dog... because I'm going to hunt down a hound." A dangerous alliance. A deadly deal. Will she be able to take everything back this time?   (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Be By My Side
description: Aylah Goldwyn's destiny had been determined since her birth: she was to marry the crown prince. However, on the day after her wedding, the prince asks for their marriage to be dissolved. Now, she suffers from near-constant headaches and insomnia, made bearable only through the embrace of a man. One night, she discovers a man who can make her headaches disappear entirely with nothing but a touch. But the next morning, she discovers that he left without a word, and she doesn't even know his name. Will she be able to find this mysterious man, her "cure"?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: XXX Buddy
description: Seo Hyunsoo is sure of one thing: people are scum and they will always disappoint you. Sure enough, at his very first company dinner after his transfer to a new department, he finds his coworker, the obnoxiously upbeat Baek Youngchan, performing an unsavory deed in the men's bathroom. As much as Hyunsoo would like to avoid Youngchan from that point on, Youngchan seems intent on not letting him out of his sight... Will Hyunsoo be able to evade the encroaching chaos of his new work neighbor? Or will these two clashing coworkers find that opposites really do attract?  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: Here Reigns the Vengeful Villainess
description: In the grand empire of Tygen, Robellia's serene life takes a dark turn, catapulting her into a saga of vengeance. In a world of power and intrigue, she exposes hidden truths, navigating a tumultuous path between hero and villain. Armed with extraordinary magic, Robellia is steadfast in unveiling the obscured secrets of the empire and recovering her lost happiness.  (Source: NHN comico)

title: Dahae Dream
description: My freaky imagination about a man turns into his dream?! So, now... should I begin playing with lots of men?  "Be careful. You'll be dreaming of me tonight."  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: Surviving as the Prince's Fiancée
description: On her way back home late one night, office worker Sophie stumbles into another world where she's a princess?! Well that's what Alan, prince of the Lapis Kingdom, says. To return to her world she must fulfill the prophecy and help Alan become king. Sophie agrees but...amidst a war for the crown, can she survive?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: For My Own Good
description: The only way out is through.  In the midst of a disastrous monster attack fated to end the world, a strange device throws Heejae back in time 20 years where he meets the students of his foster father, Seokyoung. Now it's up to him to take them under his wing and stop the apocalypse so he can finally set off for a peaceful life.  (Source: Manta)

title: Love Jinx
description: Every kiss is cursed! Haekyung's got it all: looks, personality, job. But there's one thing messing up his seemingly perfect life—a jinx. Whenever he kisses someone, he gets dumped, his projects fail, and general misery ensues. Now freshly single, will Haekyung be able to overcome his jinx.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Raising the Second Male Lead's Son
description: Our protagonist wakes up one day to find herself as Elia, the daughter of a bankrupt baron and a side character in a romance-fantasy novel. While on the run from debt collectors, she saves a child from an attacker—only to be accused of being the kidnapper by the child's guardian, Duke Kaiden. Taken to his mansion, she's forced to live with them and be the child's nanny. Can Elia clear up the misunderstanding and find her way out of this mess?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: The Girl That Wet the Wall
description: Life is good (if not a bit boring) for Jun-kyu, who works as a part-time receptionist at a local youth center. One day, a young personal trainer joins the gym... only she's the girl who took his virginity 6 years ago!  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Wizardly Tower
description: A powerful grand wizard named Raim reappears after a millennium because of a failed experiment. While sets out to regain his lost tower, he meets Are and Ere, who have been trafficked as slaves... a combination of a weird grand magician who only uses his wits to make money and the cute, lovable brother and sister of the Miao tribe! Their endless adventure is beginning to unfold.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment, translated)

title: Guardians of the Video Game
description: Patch is an elite video game agent working for a secret company that builds, operates, and guards the world of video game unbeknownst to game players. His perfect career as an elite agent starts to crumble as he gets spotted by the "Hungry Bird" game Player arriving unexpectedly to the game scene...  (Source: LINE Webtoon)
