title: Pray!
description: A decade after the fall of Shin Oktaro, Frey, a back-alley thief, stumbles upon a clue to the sibling he lost long ago. But when Koo Ilyeong, the enigmatic CEO of SNT, crosses his path, a dangerous offer is made. Under the guise of benevolence, Koo dares Frey to earn his redemption, pushing him into a game where the rules are never clear, and the stakes grow darker with each move. What is Koo's true intent, and how far will Frey go before he's consumed by the shadows of his past?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Dangerous Dungeon Escape
description: Go Insung did not pass onto hell or heaven after suddenly dying, but instead onto a dungeon. A place in between the afterlife and the world. And it's no normal dungeon, but one with a system. While being watched by the numerous dead of the afterlife, Go Insung has to clear the dungeon with the other challengers in order to escape.  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: Lovers of the Galaxy
description: Six years ago, when Wooju lost her father, she came across a kind-hearted alien in the mountains. Ever since then, she's been an avid fan of aliens, but she pretends not to believe in their existence out of fear that her classmates will ostracize her. One day, Wooju discovers a school club that meets her interests. She's excited to finally share her passion for aliens with others, but she has no idea that this will be the beginning of her exciting romance with the student body president Huimun, who has a secret of his own.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Rewriting My Third Life
description: After being abused and killed by her family in two separate lifetimes, Blesse Lavian expects nothing from them in her third life. This time, despite knowing the horrible end that awaits House Lavian, Blesse decides to keep quiet and flee when the time is right. But the more time she spends with her cold-looking father and half-sister, the more she realizes that the Lavians aren't so bad after all. Will Blesse take a chance and rewrite her third life, or will she end up betrayed once again?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Idol House
description: To Irei, who wants nothing to do with hot men, living with a K-pop group for 2 months sounds like the worst idea ever. What will happen when Irei's mom, a die-hard fan of the K-pop group NiER, wins a contest where the group comes to stay with them and film a reality show? Now Irei must deal with living with 4 hot guys and a love-struck mom.  (Source: Manta)

title: Grasp
description: Sojin Yeon, a temporary employee who posts her daily work life on her vlog, gets caught in the midst of a messy crime scene after the murder of her assistant manager. Her viewer ratings are escalating along with the shadows of her past latching onto her from moving forward. Can she break free from the mysterious crimes that are continuously occurring around her?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: A Twisted Fate
description: Demi-drake, a mythical creature yearning to ascend to dragonhood, tragically falls short, harboring resentment in its serpentine form. A twisted fate unfolds as Baeksa, a white serpent demi-drake, sees its spirit instead transmigrating into the body of Yehwa, Muyeon's stepfather. This curse thrusts both Baeksa and Muyeon into a complicated situation, with Baeksa grappling with the unfamiliar physicality of a male prostitute, and Muyeon navigating the emotional turmoil of being deeply in love with the man who now houses Baeksa's spirit. As Muyeon grapples with conflicting emotions and the desire to retaliate against Baeksa, another complicating factor emerges — Yehwa's memories begin resurfacing in Baeksa, adding even more to their twisted fantastical tale.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: 11 of Me
description: To Gibeom's surprise, the mechanical calculator he bought working at a junkyard turns out to be a time machine! With the time machine, he sets out to find and bring together his past selves. Currently, all 11 versions of Gibeom are living together peacefully, but unexpected problems materialize as Gibeom(s) interacts with people outside of his circle...  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Sweety
description: How do you distinguish between the love from a cute neighborhood girl (who’s like a little sister to you), and the love from the hottest, yet quirky, girl in school? This is exactly the question Myung-Ho has to ponder when both his neighbor’s cute little daughter, Ji-Hae, and his school’s most popular diva, Yu-Ri, make him their valentines. Of course he cares for Ji-Hae, because the poor girl’s already been through so much for someone her age, but still, she’s only just a kid. Then there’s Yu-Ri, the girl of his dreams… or rather, she would be if she wasn’t a fortune-telling voodoo witch doctor. Oh and yes, it would also help if her father, the local gangster boss, wasn’t out to kill him.  When you’re as lucky as Myung-Ho is(?) choices are very hard to make. On one hand, he could go out with Yu-Ri by turning down Ji-Hae, breaking the heart of a child who’s been depending on him ever since she moved in next door. Or, he could choose Ji-Hae by turning down the only chance at romance with a beautiful girl dead set on making him her destined love. Choices, choices… (Source: Infinity Studios)

title: Office Romance from Hell
description: Dumped by her boyfriend and fired from her job, Jineon, her family's breadwinner, has no time to cry over the spilled milk. She must find another job and fast. Enter The Hell, a mysterious company with great pay, excellent work-life balance, and an easy commute! What more could she ask for? Or so she thought. Little did she know, she had walked into hell—literally. How will she navigate the harrowing journey in the hellscape of her new job with King Yeomra, her stunning new boss, further complicating everything? Could love blossom in this pit of hell?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: You Are Obsessing Over the Wrong Person, Lord of the Tower!
description: A bad fall awakened Selina Elsner to the truth... she's been reborn into a novel! It also gave her a cruel realization—she's a no-name side character! She barely even had any lines! As if that's not bad enough, Louis Bloomberg, the evil lord of the magic tower, fancies her! He's a sorcerer so powerful that his magic speaks darkness in his mind! But one touch from Selina and all the voices would go away! Is that why he's obsessing over her instead of the real main character of the novel?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: The Eunuch's Rebirth: A Journey Back to Manhood
description: Eunuch Lee Cheolsu is a secret power figure who controls the affairs of the empire at will. He possesses absolute power, wealth, and even strong martial arts skills... but what does that mean? If he can't do "that"!  Through a reincarnation technique, Cheolsu returns to the time before he became a eunuch. He has one goal in mind: to become an alpha male and enjoy life with the most beautiful women!  (Source: Naver, translated)

title: Dazzled By You
description: For Yeonsu, writing is all there is to life. Her workaholic tendencies prevent her from properly eating, sleeping, exercising... until one day, she wakes up and finds herself in a hospital room. A clear warning from the doctor about her physical health and a desperation to come up with the plot of her next story forces Yeonsu to seek the help of Gyeol, a fellow patient. Falling in love with an athletic stranger may seem like the stuff of romance novels, but reality can often be crazier than fiction...  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Librarian of St. Bright Tower
description: Vahlen dreams of being a magician at St. Bright Tower—the greatest institute of magic in the Paula Empire. Too bad he's just a lowly librarian there... until one day when he stumbles upon a magical book that promises to bring him glory. Now he is caught in an endless cycle of horrific events, doomed to repeat the same days over and over unless he can manage to figure out how to save Princess Elyse and achieve his fated destiny.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Kowloon: Copóka
description: Jintae Seo and his younger sister Jina, a purple-eyed albino, are separated after being kidnapped by human traffickers. After two years of torment, Jintae is rescued by an assassin named Shin Kim. After years of training, Jintae, now an assassin himself, follows a lead to Hong Kong to find his sister. After accidentally getting involved in a gang war, it is revealed that Jina is apparently an assassin working for Kai Liu, another albino, who is rebelling against the Triad, and claims that Jina is his half-sister. Can Jintae stay alive long enough to reunite with her?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: This Is a Campus Romance Series
description: My name is Hayun Lee, and I'm an ordinary college student. I decided to go on a spontaneous trip before school resumed and met this guy named Kang-on. He asked me out on the first day we met, but of course, I rejected him. I thought I'd never see him again, but guess what? I ran into him during the school club recruitment event! And wait... What? Even Ji-il, the president of the student club "You," also has a crush on me?! I swear I'm not delulu. I swear!  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: The Chain of Youth
description: There are many people who like Baek Yoona, and Yoon Jia is merely one of them. She knows very well that confessing to Yoona with a love letter is nothing more than a release of suffocating emotions. However, Yoona's stunning looks, dazzling smile, and sweet demeanor are only a veil for her true dull state of apathy and utter disdain, even for those closest to her.  Yoona accepts Jia's feelings on a whim and begins dating her, even though a strange sense of revulsion suddenly fills her. Although Jia is aware that it makes her pathetic to love someone so hollow and cruel, she cannot resist the allure. Deep down, Yoona's icy heart may not be immune to the warmth of a first love, but the line between love and obsession can be dangerously thin.  [Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Pearl Boy: Ignite the Dawn
description: Baek Seung-hyun has lived in the shadows his whole life, nothing more than the deadly right hand of yakuza boss Shin Jae-il. But now, Jae-il is married. And Seung-hyun, for the first time in years, is left behind. Drifting through empty streets on the night after the wedding, Seung-hyun crosses paths with Yuta, a delicate ghost from his time in Japan. But what should have been a quiet reunion over a drink turns sharp fast. Yuta's sweetness curdles, his words cut deep, and before Seung-hyun can make sense of it everything begins to burn. Uninvited and unrelenting, Yuta storms into his life, dragging with him the weight of the past and something far more dangerous. Seung-hyun begins to fear that dawn, when it comes, won't bring light. Only fire.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Conqueror of Modern Martial Arts Kang Haejin
description: Haejin, a young boy with an unyielding spirit, even in the face of relentless school bullies due to his frailty. His determination to grow stronger knows no bounds, but his body refuses to comply. Yet, Haejin's tenacity prevails. One fateful day, he crosses paths with a homeless General, and a random act of kindness unveils hidden potential within Haejin. The enigmatic General utters the cryptic phrase, "Martial Arts does exist!" Join us on a journey as Haejin, a prodigious talent in the realm of Martial Arts, sets out to conquer the modern Martial Arts world. His story is a testament to unwavering dedication and the mysterious power that lies within.  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: The Lady Awaits a Broken Engagement
description: After being separated from her mother, Savina is forced to live with her uncle and the Charlots, who despise her. To make things worse, due to the memories of her past life, Savina learns she'll be killed by Prince Ricardo if she remains in her new home. But before she can convince her uncle to send her somewhere else, she discovers that Ricardo will be coming to stay with the Charlots. With this turn of events, will Savina successfully change her future? Or does fate have other plans for her?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: SSS Romance Collection
description: Ant Studio brings you a collection of five stories that transcend time and space, with each one filled with more love and romance than the last. This collection takes you from a world of demons versus humans to a manor full of unexpected relationships and magical surprises. After that, it brings you to a "sew"lful grand empire and then to a humble sweet potato farm full of lonely longing. Finally, you return to the present day as you reminisce about past loves by "drawing" on happy memories.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Master-Peace
description: Ju Incheol had it all...sharp suits, political connections, and a rising career as the trusted aide to Assemblywoman Lee Myeongsun, a ministerial candidate destined for power. But politics is a knife's edge, and one wrong move can send even the best men tumbling.  When Incheol loses footing in the ruthless hierarchy of the office, he's handed a near-impossible task: resolve the explosive redevelopment dispute in Songmun City's Jungang District. Failure means exile.  He's ready to do whatever it takes—until he meets Ahn Pyeong-hwa, the quiet gym owner next door and the key to the problem. Pyeong-hwa's price for cooperation?  "Hit me. That's all I want."  Behind that strange request lies something darker than bruises.  And as Incheol sinks deeper into the deal, he realizes every favor, every blow, is pulling him into a world where politics and pleasure share the same shadow.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: An Unexpected Engagement
description: Alicia, Neustein's princess, meets her fate the moment she raises her sword and encounters the wolf of the north, Cabelenus. "I just know when to give up." But Cabelenus didn't let her go, the woman who had given up a long time ago. The two of them fall uncontrollably into each other in their united fate...  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: Polar Attraction
description: Swept up in a housing swindle, Biya and Changsik end up as unlikely roommates—but Biya has a secret that doesn't bode well for her tricky co-ed housing situation... When Changsik wakes up one night to find her straddling him, completely naked, she admits to being able to see ghosts—needy, horny ones with very specific bodily needs. With ghosts flocking to their room every night, the two newly met strangers must figure out a way to fend them off!  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Beast
description: Jeon Doo-in's relationship with Baek Ryong is complicated. He gets paid by Ryong to do dirty jobs, which is standard fare for a thug like him. The fact that they have sex together doesn't make things that messy, either. The part where everything gets complicated is the fact that Doo-in doesn't really want any kind of relationship with Ryong in the first place. Doo-in isn't the type of man to be domesticated, and Ryong likes him that way... but he doesn't want to let his "beast" go, either.  (Source: Lezhin Comics)

title: Teach Me How to Desire
description: In a war against demons for the fate of the world, even three chances at life may not suffice. Such is the fate of Lady Sacred Beryl, a divine maiden tasked with rooting out demonic corruption, only to be murdered and travel back in time—twice. Upon her third attempt, Beryl realizes the truth: Her only hope to purify the realm is to face the fearsome House Vine, a lair of demons in mortal guise. Can Beryl survive in the domain of Duke Beleth von Vine, or will she find nothing but death and damnation once more?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Rise and Shine, Hero!
description: As the winner of the Kingdom Warrior Tournament, Ah-in is tasked by the king with finding the missing princess. During his journey, he encounters various buxom beauties who are more than willing to help him however they can! In fact, most of them want to ravish him, including his childhood friend and companion, Garnet. Will Ah-in be able to complete his quest with so many girls vying for his attention?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: The Wicked Wife of a Scheming CEO
description: Eunsang Hahm just caught her boyfriend cheating, and Kyungwoo Kang, the CEO of her company, is engaged to someone he doesn't love. They both agree to a mutually beneficial fake relationship. After all, it's just a business deal, so... what could go wrong? But as the two begin their scheme, it is clear that their connection runs deeper than what is written in their contract. With his rich family set on finding out the truth, and her nosy coworkers and the media watching their every move, how long will they be able to keep up the charade?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Fake Humans
description: Having escaped her abusive mother, twenty-year-old Ji-a lives a modest life with her little sister, Su-a. When Su-a does not return from her field trip under sinister circumstances, Ji-a vows to do anything she can to get her sister back. As she and her high school friend Wonseung delve further into the mystery, they find that there might be a larger conspiracy under the surface—a tangled web that includes a cult, a mystery, and powerful figures that might shake South Korea to its core.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Sora's Eyes
description: Sora has descended from the mountains to guard the sickly Jungha. The two have a set of rules to guide them: One, Sora decides what is considered an emergency. Two, Jungha must listen to Sora in an emergency. Three, Jungha must not bully Sora. Will they be able to stick to them?  (Source: Manta)

title: Ctrl+Z
description: What if you had the power to erase people's memories? Would you use it to help those in need? Or would you use it to become the most powerful person in the world? For Kyle, this newfound power was going to change his life... for better or for worse.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Happy & Murphy
description: Hangyul has only been carrying credit cards (no cash) since her kidnapping when she was 6 years old. One day, Gyuh-lu, the adopted son of her birth mother appears and transfers her to his school and starts living with her at her house….?!  About how these two delinquents meet. Their life... is it meant to be fated...?  (Source: MangaUpdates)

title: Dawn of the New Body
description: Yoo Geon is just a normal teenager, were it not for the fact that he's dying from a disease that gives him excruciating pain but also blesses him with supernatural strength. And despite his best efforts to focus on his illness and avoid the troublesome criminals and delinquents at his school, he has no choice but to intervene when their schemes cause a classmate to get kidnapped. Sick of their behavior, Geon decides to put an end to their crimes... even if it's the last thing he ever does.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Elegant Desire
description: For the past twelve years, she has been waiting for her first love, who motivates her to play the violin and pursue her dreams, but that little hope shattered into pieces when she finally sees him unexpectedly kissing a rich married middle-aged woman the moment the elevator doors opens. In a turn of events she becomes the tutor of the married lady's son. With her first love having no memories of her and the shocking affair upon her eyes, how will things unfold?  "My first love that became the property of a wealthy middle-aged married woman. My first love can't be the kind of guy who's stuck with an old lady..."  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: Masca: The Kings
description: Did you think Masca: The Tale of the Great Mage of Hessed was over? Masca: the Kings is the sequel of Masca, in which Asarella goes on a journey to save Kainen. However, the first two volumes focus quite a bit on the development between Rea and Rakin (Kainen's beautiful ex(?) and another demon king).  (Source: MU)

title: Not That Villainess!
description: Iris Sabrina sets out from home to the capital to fulfill her dream of becoming a knight. However, her journey takes an unexpected turn when she's mistaken for her twin sister—whom she never knew existed—Arke Bright, a notorious villainess who's been missing for months. As Iris struggles to navigate life in the capital and prove she's not her sister, she meets a family she never knew she had and a handsome prince who helps her unravel the truth behind her sister's dark past.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: I Stole the Tyrant's Virginity
description: Reborn as a villainess in a romance novel, Eudis Peregrine knows she's destined to die at the hands of the tyrannical Emperor Theodore Waldemar. To avoid this cruel death, Eudis plans to stay far away. But after a drunken night at a masked ball, she wakes up in bed with none other than the emperor himself! Now, with the smitten Theodore proposing marriage, Eudis must navigate this unexpected plot twist. Can one night of romance change her predetermined fate, or is she bound to her tragic ending?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Like Fine Wine
description: Yong-joon is all set to spend an uneventful summer vacation at his college friend Deok-hee's place. So, he was not prepared for how hot Deok-hee's mom, Mrs. Park, is. Blown away by her beauty, Yong-joon is increasingly drawn to her. He knows it's wrong... but she is like a fine bottle of wine he wants to gulp down in a go. Fate works in Yong-joon's favor when he finds himself escorting an injured Mrs. Park to the doctor's office. Alone with Mrs. Park, the young, hot-blooded Yong-joon can no longer control himself and makes his move. But will Mrs. Park give in, or will he be rejected?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Arelyn Is Sick and Tired
description: The Caretakers' Council is a group of dedicated servants with only one goal: to nurse terminally ill Arelyn Halbern back to health. But Arelyn is already resigned to her fate, knowing she's simply an extra in a novel meant to die young. That is, until Crown Prince Pession Allermand takes an interest in her. Now, Pession visits Arelyn daily, nagging her to eat better, play, and be more active. With the novel's male lead lending his strength, can Arelyn finally find the will to fight her illness?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Her Nickname Is...
description: Ever wonder what having sex with a werewolf would be like? How about a vampire? Well, Hyunee and Mina are two normal girls, but when things get hot and heavy they're not afraid to let their animalistic sides come out! Driving their boyfriends crazy, there's always another sex romp around the corner. Come along for the ride, where in each episode, you can see a different "monstrous" side of these hot girls and really see what "Her Nickname is..."!  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: A Kiss Before I Sleep
description: Jiho has a superpower that causes explosions whenever she gets excited, making dating and fun nearly impossible—until she discovers that touching her new neighbor, Yechan, miraculously helps her control her ability. Determined to maintain physical contact without outright harassing him, Jiho embarks on a mission to "seduce" Yechan and become his girlfriend. Along the way, ghostly advice and a whirlwind of chaos lead her to uncover the mystery of their unique connection in this unpredictable romance.  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: The Glamorous Life of the Fake Mistress
description: In her past life, Duke Casis Esteban swept Sally off her feet and took her in as his mistress. However, she was living in a nightmare when Duchess Elysee Esteban plotted to ruin her life and turn all the nobles against her. Now, Sally has a second chance to turn the tables on the cold duke who used her to end his unhappy marriage. She agrees to be the duke's mistress only in appearance. Meanwhile, Duke Esteban finds Sally's intelligence impressive, and his alluring dreams of her have him wanting to drop the fictional part of their arrangement.  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: The World of Dating
description: On the day she declared she'd stay single, three men who had never been in Seul's life appeared in front of her. A dreamy ideal type, a male friend who she thought would be her lifelong friend, and even a blind date with excellent realistic conditions, appear all at once. Will Seul be able to keep her convictions of staying single until the end?  (Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: An Insincere Idol's Blank Slate
description: K-pop idol Yoon Eden has wasted away for years under a mediocre label with an incompetent CEO. He is disillusioned and on the verge of quitting when he's sent back in time to the day of his debut. Now, Eden is determined to use his songwriting talent to rewrite his career and gain some well-deserved fame. Despite his CEO still pushing cheesy songs and tacky concepts, can Eden, with the help of his group members, truly reignite his spark and become a sincerely dazzling idol?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: One-Room Hero
description: After spending his entire life in all-male schools till high school, Mingu finally enters college. Making things more exciting is the fact that he's in the Food and Nutrition Department with a male to female ratio of 1 to 9! A virgin and single since birth, this is his opportunity to date girls and enjoy a romantic campus life. But one wrong lie during a drinking party turns his life upside down and now he's been branded as a sex beast all over the school!  (Source: Lezhin Comics)

title: Ice Ice Baby
description: 1. Ice Ice Baby 2. Dalgwa 60-won 3. Kkochiyo Yongwoni 4. Sokkkochiyo Yongwoni 5. Iltaryongwi 6. Oh My Dolrong

title: My Status Window Went on Strike
description: Monsters pour out of gates, wreaking havoc on the world, but Taejun couldn't care less. After seven years of failure and bullying in his hunter's guild, he's fired—until his dormant S-Tier power suddenly activates. Now, with newfound strength, Taejun hunts monsters, exacts brutal revenge, and rises to fame. But as his power grows, so does the danger, and shadowy forces begin targeting him. Can Taejun stay one step ahead and crush those who want him dead?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: The Duke's Villainous Daughter Is Depressed
description: Irene Song had transmigrated inside a novel and became the villainous daughter of a duke. However, the duke, who was unaware of this fact, simply thought she had amnesia and sent her off to marry the second prince of Rennes Empire. Little did she know that the second prince was cursed by an evil wizard and and would turn into a dog during the day and could only turn back to human at night. What's worse, she even named the dog "Tofu" after she found it wandering the imperial palace. Who would have known it was her own husband?!  (Source: Kai Scans, edited)

title: See You Again
description: Shiwoo always used to say, "Yujin, you're my favorite person in the whole wide world." And Shiwoo always believed he was truly special to Yujin. After all, Shiwoo never really liked all those girls he dated, anyway. But when Yujin finally confesses his love, he finds himself rejected and alone... Years later, Shiwoo is a celebrity. The hard-to-manage celebrity gets a new manager that seems so familiar... her name is even Yujin... It takes but one night of too many drinks for Shiwoo to discover she isn't really what she seems.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: From Morning to Night
description: Having lost his parents at a young age, twelve-year-old Mane fills the role of protector for his younger sibling Nox. When their hometown of Night relocates all the townspeople to build a temple for its goddess Obscurity, Mane and Nox start a new life in the neighboring town of Morning. Trouble awaits them as Nox vanishes as if by magic. Devastated and distrustful of others, Mane turns to Morning's goddess Lumiere for help. Told that he must vanquish Obscurity to save his kidnapped sibling, Mane is given the body of a grown man and sent on a perilous journey. Though still a young boy inside, he must find allies while uncovering dark secrets about mortals and immortals alike. Will Mane be able to tell friend from foe and save his sibling in a world where nothing is as it seems?  (Source: Tappytoon)

title: A Love Guard
description: It's about four people. A young police man who joined the force so he could beat people up legally. While he was on the join he messed up and was almost fired but instead was given the job of body guard. So now he has to live like a teen again. the second one is a kid who was raised to take over a large business till they found the real heir. He then became the servant of the new heir. the third one is the new heir. She used to be a normal girl who was orphaned at a young age but was soon found to be the heiress. She used to be normal but the power and money twisted her head and made her a spoiled brat who doesn't care about anyone but her self. The last one is a biker gang's boss. She has a thing for rules and is rather strong. Though her appearance is the total opposite of her strength. She was the reason why the police man almost got fired. She has an odd way with people and can easily persuade them. She is also a body guard for the rich heiress though the reasons are unknown.  (Source: Mangahere)

title: My Lovely Master
description: (If I can make money, I will do anything)   I can sell (give up on) my love, or risk my life. You want to use me as a tool to revenge your little brother [or sister]? Here, I will be used. Buy me. I am very expensive.  Eun Hyool, you said you will do anything if you get paid? I will buy every single piece of you. From now on, you are my slave. But, I will refuse your heart.  These two are getting used to each other by endlessly running against each other. Love that formed through quarrels is risky like a flower at the end of a cliff!   (Source: MU)

title: Kiss Me, Liar
description: Yeonwoo is a perfectly competent secretary. However, he's secretly in love with his boss, an extreme alpha named Keith, who has zero interest in male omegas. After a traumatic incident leaves Yeonwoo fearful of all alphas but Keith, he resigns to hide at home. Keith, inconvenienced by the absence of his trusty secretary, takes on the task of helping Yeonwoo recover. Will proximity and pheromones cause love to blossom in this working relationship?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: Master of All Skills
description: "Whoa, your skill is insane!" [Skill successfully copied.]  There's no power he can't claim. What's yours becomes his—what's his stays his. This is the beginning of Yoo Ju-Yeon's unstoppable rise as the ultimate Skill Master!  (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

title: I Became a Childhood Friend of the Obsessive Sub Male Lead
description: Born with memories of the novel How to Survive as an Ordinary Lady, Princess Rietta Lise is next in line for the throne of the Kingdom of Lise. But after being sold to the empire by her father, a king who lives in luxury and pleasure, she enters the ducal Mayer estate. Upon realizing that Noel, the duke's second son, is the sub-male lead of the novel, she'll try to repay the dukedom's favor by making him the real male protagonist!  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: What Lies Within
description: Hector's renowned father, a celebrated sculptor, dies just before unveiling his magnum opus—Minor: David. While reviewing his late father's estate, Hector stumbles upon a mysterious villa—inside, he finds a young man named Enoch...someone he's never seen nor even heard of. The moment Hector lays eyes on him, he realizes that Enoch was the very muse for his father's masterpiece. Driven to madness, Enoch must escape his grasp through a mad game of hide and seek, or face the beast that lies within the nature of man.  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: I Tamed the Male Lead's Father
description: This is a tale of Lireis Deldearue, the sole heir to the demonic House Deldearue. Unworthy as a newborn, Lireis is sentenced to death. Will she survive? Maybe. Is it because she made a pact with the Demon King or that she was saved by Agnos, leader of the rival House Ardelos? Or maybe it's because I reincarnated as Lireis, and I know what's fated to come! I'm destined to resurrect the Demon King, continuing the eternal battle between monsters and humans, but what happens if I fight against fate?  (Source: Tapas Media)

title: My Girlfriend's Ex-Boyfriend
description: I was never curious about my girlfriend's past...until that incident! Now I'm just dying to know! Who is this ex-boyfriend? Why is he acting so friendly? What happened between them in the past?! It sure isn't your typical love triangle.  (Source: Lezhin Comics)

title: Don't Hate the Player
description: Mujik is a lowly programmer at a video game company. He regularly gets chewed out by his boss and constantly works overtime. But one day a bug in the virtual reality game he plays makes all the female NPCs fall in love with him. What's more, the game even rewards him with the ability to charm women...in real life?! Mujik's office is full of hotties and now he's gonna make the most of his leveled-up charisma. It's his game he's playing now, so let a player play...  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Justice Arcade
description: Lee Doosan is a master of the arcade. The only place he can find reprieve from the agony of adolescence, the games there act as an outlet for the stress and strain of daily life. But when he runs into his childhood best friend at the hottest spot in town—Justice Arcade—the real games begin. As the two boys try to reconcile their complicated feelings about the past with the realities of the present, will they be able to achieve a high score for their futures? Or is this reunion "game over" from the get-go...?  (Source: Lezhin Entertainment)

title: Random Target
description: After the failure of her first love, Serin easily and quickly falls in love with any good-looking guy. Two days before her birthday, she gets dumped by her hot boyfriend, and her search for a man like the legendary unicorn continues. Little did she know, she'd meet a real unicorn on the virtual reality blind dating app called Random Target. Is this app the golden ticket to finding her true love?  (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)
